thread.title: Carrie Golden
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Carrie Golden

author: Carrie Golden
title: Carrie Golden
text: Delivery team was prompt and handled the delivery efficiently. They did however leave the bag on the box spring (but not the mattress) and I had to muscle it off myself. I deducted a star for not removing the packaging but otherwise a quick and efficient team. They were in and out in under ten minutes.
